nodes.text: In the first year of the Clone Wars, a fierce battle was fought between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems on the planet N'dian. During the battle, Republic Advanced Recon Commando Null-11 managed to eliminate a group of Confederates hiding in one of N'dian's urban centers, but had to virtually destroy the city in the process.

An intense battle was fought between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems on the Outer Rim Territories planet N'dian in 22 BBY, the first year of the Clone Wars. During the battle, the Republic dispatched the Null-class Advanced Recon Commando and Clone Captain Null-11, nicknamed "Ordo," to eradicate a collection of Confederates believed to be hiding in one of N'dian's urban centers. Ordo located and eliminated the Confederates, but was forced to single-handedly obliterate most of the city in the process.

The battle on N'dian was first briefly mentioned in the Karen Traviss novel Republic Commando: Triple Zero, released on February 28, 2006. The events of the battle were later expanded upon in N'dian's entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, released December 9, 2008.
